ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We are grateful to Prof Richard Chiverell for useful discussions and to Dr Anu Patel, Sabena Blackbird, Jort Ossebaar, Florian Boxberg and Janet Rethemeyer for help in the laboratories. The palynological analyses were facilitated by Andr√© Lotter. The work was funded by the Leverhulme Trust (grant F/00 025/AU) and the German Research Foundation (DFG, grant WA2109/1-1).
